data.title: Zamoyski
data.text:
The members of Line I bear the name and title Saryusz, Count[ess] Zamosc Zamoyski/Zamoyska. The members of Line II bear the name and title Saryusz, Count[ess] Zamoyski/Zamoyska.

Preface: This preface will be an incomplete genealogy, just to show the relationship between the two branches set out more fully below.

Matthias Zamoyski; m.Beate ___

1a) Jan Zamoyski; m.___

1b) Jan Zamoyski; m.N Gorzkowska

1c) Jan Zamoyski, k.a.Stryj 1619; m.1591 Pss Anne Wisniowiecka

1d) Zdislaus Jan Zamoyski (1570- ); m.Css Sophie Lanckorońska

1e) Martin Zamoyski (1637-1689); m.1675 Anne Franziska Gnińksa (d.1704)

1f) Michael Zdislaus Zamoyski (1679-1735); m.1st 1703 Anne Dzialyńska (d.1719); m.2nd 1722 Pss Elizabeth Wiśniowiecka (1701-1770)

1g) Ct Andreas Zamoyski (1716-1792); m.Warsaw 1768 Pss Konstantia Czartoryska

1h) Ct Stanislaus Zamoyski (1775-1856); m.Pulawy 1798 Pss Sophie Czartoryska (1778-1837); for his issue see Line I, below
